title: Occupy Wall Street protestors in New York City
brief_description: In 2011, the connectivity and speed of social media seemed promising for society and democracy. Platforms like Facebook, Twitter and YouTube were integral to mobilising people and coordinating protest movements like Occupy Wall Street, which aims to create greater economic equality.

constellations_primary.name: Fight for your right
constellations_primary.description: Real world revolution and the fictional representations that reflect the struggle for equality in the past, present and dystopian future.
